patterns: Class Caste something that will vary
responses: This has been fixed in version 2020.XX. Please update your application.
This is caused by a missing value in setup. To fix: login to app > screen 1 > edit > change setting 18 > save > retry > the error should no longer happen.
This is expected to get fixed in a future release. Please reference Jira item abc-1234 for addtional details.
Sorry about that. This is an unknown issue. Please submit a ticket at '.../issue_tracker/website' so that it can be followed up on.

patterns: How can I change the functionality of my application?
I want a certain feature to work differently.
responses: Users can submit enhancement requests at '.../product_ideas.com'.
Take a look at '.../product_ideas.com' to see if this request already exists. If not, please submit a new one.
Billable work orders are available on request. To get one for your application please contact the sales team at ...sales@company.com.
Release and patch notes are available at '.../code_version/release_version/patch_notes'.

patterns: How can I update my application?
responses: Application are updated at '.../deployment/server/product/client'. There is additional documentation about this process at '.../product/deployment'.
See you later, thanks for visiting. Type 'quit' to exit.
Have a nice day. Type 'quit' to exit.
